code: import{unitsActionType}from'../../constants';export default(function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case unitsActionType.FETCH_UNITS:return action.payload;case unitsActionType.FETCH_UNIT:return[action.payload];case unitsActionType.ADD_UNIT:return[...state,action.payload];case unitsActionType.EDIT_UNIT:return state.map(item=>item.id===+action.payload.id?action.payload:item);case unitsActionType.DELETE_UNIT:return state.filter(item=>item.id!==action.payload);default:return state;}});
